## Discussion

After calling the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentSession/begin()] method, wait until the session’s delegate receives the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentSessionDelegate/assessmentSessionDidBegin(_:)] method before starting an assessment or showing sensitive information. # begin()

**Instance Method**

Starts an assessment session.

## Declaration

```swift
func begin()
```

## Discussion

After calling the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentSession/begin()] method, wait until the session’s delegate receives the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentSessionDelegate/assessmentSessionDidBegin(_:)] method before starting an assessment or showing sensitive information. When you’re ready to stop the assessment session, call the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentSession/end()] method.

## Starting and stopping a session

- **end()**: Ends an assessment session.
- **isActive**: A Boolean that indicates whether an assessment session is running.

items.description: A Boolean that indicates whether an assessment session is running.
